Question: Obama described this person's films as "essays in individuality, hard truths and the essence of what it means to be American.".
Hints: This person starred in the thriller Escape from Alcatraz in 1979, the last of his films to be directed by Don Siegel.
In 2000, this person directed and starred in Space Cowboys alongside Tommy Lee Jones, Donald Sutherland, and James Garner.
Kelly's Heroes was the last film in which this person appeared, that was not produced by his own Malpaso Productions.
